DOC.brief_summary: To prove that video about endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography (ERCP) combined with written informed consent provides participants more information about the procedure, which can make participants understand the procedure well. Investigators advocate the development of institutional and national guidelines to ensure optimal practices of acquiring informed consent.
DOC.brief_title: Video Consent Form Versus Written Consent Form for ERCP
DOC.criteria: All inpatients who will receive ERCP under 18 years or more than 70 years pregnancy or breastfeeding women circulatory and respiratory disorders mental illness
